text: Hey brother ,  kya se kya hogya dekhte dekhte . I have never felt bored spending time with u    , jab bhi bore lage tera room chale jata tha . Zyada English mein nahi likhunga  , tujhe pata hi hai kitna strong hai mera English ğŸ˜. Tere bina quarantine pura depressing ho jata . Yaadein bahut hai , sara nahi likhne wala . You are a very good human being , Don't ever  change . And thanks for making me addicted to PESğŸ˜¬
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Hey brother , I can confidently say that you are the one who has helped me the most in my engineering days  . Sayad mein mere room se zyada tere room pe time kata hun . Mein jeetna cheez tere se seekha hun sayad hi kisise sikha hoga college mein . Yadein sab nahi likhne wala bahut saare hain , bas ek quote likhunga : I have made many friends in my life but there are some  friends who have made me and you are one of them . I hope mera kehna ka matlab samj jayegağŸ˜…
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Hey man , I feel very lucky to have a friend like you . Tere bina mera ek do course mein pakka dakka lagta . Kaafi helpful aadmi hai tu , aise hi rehna . You are the life of any party , tere bina party karne mein maja nahi ata . Saare yaadein toh nahi likhne wala , bahut yaadein hai ğŸ˜‚. Talking to you about any of my problem was always so comfortable for me and you always had a solution . Yeh mai sach bol rha hun , tere jaise log kaafi kam hote hain aur aise hi rehna . Zyada tareef ho gyi . Corona khatam hone ke baad milte hain phir acche se aur bulla katenge phir.....
author: Ritesh  Naik

text:
Hey bro , sabse pehla aadmi jisse baat kiya iitk aake . Kaafi chill and has a solution for every tough situation . Kabhi bhi koi problem hoti bina kuch soch kr tereko bata deta hun . Mujhe lagta hai jaise tu mereko sabse jyada samajhta hai pure iitk mein . Kaafi accha lagta hai time spend karna tere saath . Ek do trip bhi karliyr hote toh bakchod hota . 

First year mein kaafi guidance mila hai Terese ( including studies and life skills) . Kaafi lucky tha jo terejaisa roomate mil gya ğŸ˜. Jitne bhi party kare hain saath mein woh sab yaad rahega .
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Big fan of your mimickry sir , bas mera imitation karna band kardeğŸ™. A honest boy and a man of integrity , I must say . Bollywood ki funny batein karne mein kaafi maja ata hai bhai tere saath  , jo ki kisi se itna nahi karta . Itna din ho gya hai tujhe dekhe hue ki tera chera bhulne laga hun bhai , kabhi dikha dena acche se .
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Bhai inn kuch saalon mein tumne kuch zyada hi help kiya hai mera aur bure time mein saath diya hai (placement aur semester problems ) . It was nice to have a friend to share all my problems . Aise hi contact mein rehte hai aur jeevan mein kuch kar dikhate hain
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Are bhai bhai , kya likhu , sab toh bol hi chuka hun . Jo bhi dil mein ata bejijhak tere ko bolta hun , kuch hai hi nahi bhai likhne ko . Bahut kuch sikha hai bhai Terese . Tere room mein jaake , tere se kuch ghante baat karleta toh kya maje aa jatethe bhai . Kya yeh memoir yeh sab ka idea nahi meko kya likhna hai , bas itna batana chahta hun ki you have been a great friend â¤ï¸ and talking to you heals a lot of my problems
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Apne hall ke alawa agar kisi aur hall ke laundo se zyada milke rha hun toh woh tum aur mukesh ho bhai . You have been a great friend all the way . Time thik hoga toh Bangalore mein rahenge bhaiğŸ˜
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Are bhai , woh placement ka raat , late aya tha apna naam , alag hi kuch tha . Ritesh ke jariye mile the aur battein hui . Cse ka chappu launda , har company shortlist mein naam , god aadmi hai tu
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: You are the most ideal boy according to me . Tujh jaisa accha ladka mein life mein bahut kam dekha hai , kabhi change mat hona bhai . Tu isse bhi zyada tareef deserve karta hai . Bhai mein pata nahi itna lucky kaise ho gya ki phy101 ki lab mein tu milvaya mera partner â¤ï¸. Chahta hun ki tu bahut aage tak jaye bhai aur ek bada aadmi bane . Tere mein woh baat hai bhai , best of luck for your future . You have been a great friend yaar .
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Bhai yaar tereko kaise bhul sakta hun . Saviour , god , chaapu , cool and everything . Bhai itna accha kaise ho sakta hai koi . Bas aise hi rehna â¤ï¸
author: Ritesh  Naik

text:
Bhai inn 4 saal mein tere saath kaafi accha time spend kiya hai . tere saath baatein karne mein kaafi maja ata hai . Tu kaafi genuine aur accha ladka hai . I feel lucky ki tere jaise ladke se dosti ho pai . Asha hai ki milte rahenge 
...
author: Ritesh  Naik

text: Kya likhu , battein toh hoti rehti hai . Burei aur acche samay kaafi saath diya bhai  , thanks . Kaafi lucky hun ki tum mil gye yaar warna pata nahi kya hota . Baki ka phone pe baat karlengeğŸ˜‚
author: Ritesh  Naik
